Title: Add product to cart
Steps:
1. Navigate to product page
2. Click 'Add to cart'
Expected Result: Product added to cart and visible in cart

Title: Remove product from cart
Steps:
1. Go to cart page
2. Click 'Remove' on a product

Title: Update quantity
Description: User updates product quantity in cart
Steps:
1. Go to cart page
2. Change quantity value
3. Update cart
